import android.os.Bundle
import android.speech.tts.TextToSpeech
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2
import com.example.myapplication.R
import com.example.myapplication.adapters.WordCardAdapter
import com.example.myapplication.models.WordCard
import java.util.Locale

class VisualPracticeActivity : AppCompatActivity() {

 private lateinit var viewPager: ViewPager2
 private lateinit var adapter: WordCardAdapter
 private lateinit var textToSpeech: TextToSpeech

 private val wordCardList = listOf(
 WordCard(R.drawable.resim1, "Apple"),
 WordCard(R.drawable.resim2, "Banana"),
 WordCard(R.drawable.resim3, "Cat"),

 )

 override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
 super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
 setContentView(R.layout.activity_visual_practice)

 viewPager = findViewById(R.id.viewPagerWords)

 adapter = WordCardAdapter(wordCardList) { word ->
 speakWord(word)
 }
 viewPager.adapter = adapter

 textToSpeech = TextToSpeech(/* context = */ this) {
 if (it != TextToSpeech.ERROR) {
 textToSpeech.language = Locale.US
 }
 }
 }

 private fun speakWord(word: String) {
 textToSpeech.speak(word, TextToSpeech.QUEUE_FLUSH, null, null)
 }

 override fun onDestroy() {
 textToSpeech.shutdown()
 super.onDestroy()
 }
}
